title: Rejected Yet Loved
features: Can you imagine marrying a man who is not in love with you and who made love to you on your wedding night thinking you were someone else? This is exactly what happened to a woman named Leah. Her husband, Jacob was in love with her sister, Rachel and that's who he thought he had married. On the wedding night, Leah's dad put Leah in the bed instead of Rachel. How do you think Jacob felt, but what's more important, how do you think Leah felt? Read her story and discover the greatest love you will ever know - the love of the Almighty God.
description: Rejected Yet Loved speaks to the heart of every woman, single, married, divorced or widowed who has ever experienced rejection and low self-esteem. Rejected Yet Love is a book that will minister to men as well.
Brace yourself. Rejected Yet Loved will take you on a journey from rejection and bondage to love, healing and deliverance, from self hatred to discovering the greatest love you will ever know.

Lauri V. Mack was born the first child to Chester and Willie Marion McNeal of Canton, Ohio. Lauri is the wife of Bruce V. Mack and between the 2 of them they have 8 children and 6 grandchildren. Lauri is an ordained minister and serves at Deeper Life Full Gospel Ministries located in Canton, Ohio. She carries the anointing of teacher and pastor on her life and has been faithfully teaching the word of God for nearly 20 years. Her main focus is ministering to hurting women letting them know that God can heal the whole person, spiritually, emotionally, and physically.
